activities.name: Student-Run Investment Club
activities.description: Founded investment club that manages $10,000 portfolio, teaches financial literacy to peers
activities.impact: Portfolio returned 12% annually, taught 50+ students about investing and personal finance

activities.name: Local Tutoring Business
activities.description: Started tutoring business connecting high school students with younger students needing academic help
activities.impact: Generated $15,000 revenue, employed 8 tutors, helped 40+ students improve grades by average of 1.2 GPA points

activities.name: Model United Nations
activities.description: Led school's MUN program, organized conferences, specialized in international economic policy
activities.impact: Doubled club membership, won best delegation at 5 conferences

core_values.description: Believe in creating opportunities and solutions through innovative business approaches
Passionate about teaching others financial skills and economic understanding
Believe the best businesses and organizations succeed by empowering others

defining_moments.title: Starting a Business During Family Financial Struggles
defining_moments.description: When my parents' small business struggled during the pandemic, I launched my tutoring service to help with family finances. I was nervous about balancing schoolwork with entrepreneurship, but the business succeeded beyond my expectations and taught me about resilience and financial planning.
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Anxious about family finances, then proud to contribute meaningfully
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Sometimes challenges create the best opportunities to discover your capabilities

defining_moments.title: Learning to Balance Profit with Purpose
defining_moments.description: Initially, my tutoring business focused purely on profit maximization. However, when I met students who couldn't afford tutoring but desperately needed help, I created a scholarship program funded by higher-paying clients. This taught me that sustainable businesses must balance profit with social impact.
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Conflicted between profit and principles, then fulfilled by finding balance
defining_moments.lessons_learned: The most sustainable businesses create value for all stakeholders, not just shareholders

defining_moments.title: Teaching Investment Fundamentals to Skeptical Peers
defining_moments.description: When I started the investment club, many students thought investing was 'gambling' or only for wealthy people. I had to overcome these misconceptions by starting with basic financial literacy and demonstrating consistent, research-based investment strategies. Seeing classmates become confident investors was incredibly rewarding.
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Frustrated by misconceptions, then excited by students' transformation
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Education and patience can break down barriers to financial empowerment

model_extra.essay_prompt: Tell me about a time you faced a challenge, setback, or failure. How did it affect you, and what did you learn from the experience?

essay_prompt: Tell me about a time you faced a challenge, setback, or failure. How did it affect you, and what did you learn from the experience?
